comments_since_last_sample.body: Они нас убили с этими нарядами😍
the outfit and the looks they look so stunning
MBC harusnya janagn dipotong dong pas Secret Number mau nyanyi Dangerous in love 😭sebel aku  sama MBC😭

This was absolutely stunningly beautfiul! Besides the neos and everything about their performance, I LOVED the gothic structure set, the "stained glass" windows, gold/red lighting, black feather edit flowing down at the end.... SIMPLY GORGEOUS!
Never get tired for the favorite of favorite.
the opening had me holding my breath for 13 seconds straight
They are slaying every stage, dont forget to watch the mv also, please lets give them many wins please

Thank you mbc for focus jungwoo🙏🏻🙏🏻
